# afena-database

## Usage

```ts
import { /* ... */ } from 'afena-database';
```

## API

See source files for available exports.

## Installation

```bash
pnpm -w add afena-database
```

## Exports

| Subpath | Conditions |
|---|---|
| `.` | default: `./src/index.ts` |

## Scripts

| Script | Command |
|---|---|
| `build` | `tsup` |
| `db:barrel` | `npx tsx src/scripts/generate-schema-barrel.ts` |
| `db:generate` | `drizzle-kit generate` |
| `db:lint` | `npx tsx src/scripts/schema-lint.ts` |
| `db:migrate` | `drizzle-kit migrate` |
| `db:push` | `drizzle-kit push` |
| `db:studio` | `drizzle-kit studio` |
| `dev` | `tsup --watch` |
| `lint` | `eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --cache --concurrency=auto` |
| `lint:ci` | `eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --rule 'import/no-cycle: error'` |
| `lint:fix` | `eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --cache --fix` |
| `test` | `vitest run` |
| `type-check` | `tsc --noEmit` |
